html:
** Electric vehicle maker's shares RIVN.O up 6.4% at $62.6 after billionaire George Soros takes stake in quarter ended Dec. 31, according to filings (Full Story)

** With 19.8 mln shares, worth ~$2 billion at the time, Soros Fund Management is among the most prominent investors in the co alongside Ford Motor Co F.N and Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O

** Stock set for its best session in two weeks

** F owns about 11% of RIVN shares, AMZN owns about 18% of co's shares, and Soros has more than 2% in shares - Refinitiv

** RIVN has fallen ~25% since IPO in Nov. 2021, as of last close


(Reporting by Akash Sriram in Bengaluru)

(( Akash.Sriram@thomsonreuters.com ;))
